title: Settings
subtitle: Manage your preferences and system configuration

profile.title: User Profile
profile.contactAdmin: Contact your administrator to update profile information

files.title: File Management
files.defaultAutoDelete: Default auto-delete period for your uploads (days)
files.willBeDeleted: Your files will be auto-deleted after {{days}} days by default
files.leaveEmpty: Leave empty to never auto-delete your files (you can override per upload)
files.personalNote: This is your personal default. When you upload files, they will use this setting automatically unless you specify a different value during upload.

security.title: Security Settings
security.sessionTimeoutDesc: How long to stay logged in before requiring re-authentication
security.requireStrongPassword: Require strong passwords (uppercase, lowercase, number, special character)
security.auditLogNote: Audit logs are permanent and cannot be automatically deleted. Only uploaded files can be set to auto-delete after N days in the Files settings.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
twoFactor.description: Add an extra layer of security by requiring a code from your authenticator app. You'll be asked to verify once per new device.
twoFactor.disableWarning: Disabling 2FA will make your account less secure. Are you sure you want to continue?

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.description: To change your password, please contact your administrator or use the password change feature in your profile menu.

ui.title: UI & Display Preferences
ui.languageHint: Change the display language of the application
